name: MPS Limited A Macmillan Company Reviews

review.title: “Rural company-good if you want a paycheck with no growth potential.”
review.pros: Pros – It is a job in a small area. There is a sense of community within the lower level employees. There is an odd tuition reimbursement program.
review.cons: Cons – Prpmotions are rare and are given only when someone retires. The working conditions are tolerable, but do not expect advancement.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give employees an opportunity for professional development.

review.title: “Incompetent management, in it for personal gain only, will never move the company forward.”
review.pros: Pros – If you go in with your eyes open and negotiate hard, you can probably do well financially.
review.cons: Cons – You may need to scrub this off your resume or downplay it, as the company's reputation for poor quality and corruption may taint you. Turnover is very high below senior management, as hard work, honesty, client service, and high-quality performance are not valued, whereas personal loyalty (as opposed to company or client loyalty) is paramount.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
